channel.title: Freaky Friday on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Freaky Friday on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Box Office: ‘Weapons’ Blazes to $42.5M Opening, ‘Freakier Friday’ Smiles Wide With $29M Bow
item.description: New Line’s horror pic and Disney’s family comedy delivered a double win at the late summer box office, as well as a victory for two challenged genres.

item.title: Box Office: ‘Weapons’ Blazes to $42.5M Opening, ‘Freakier Friday’ Smiles Wide With $29M Bow
item.description: New Line’s horror pic and Disney’s family comedy delivered a double win at the late summer box office, as well as a victory for two challenged genres.

item.title: Jamie Lee Curtis Responds to Negative ‘Freakier Friday’ Review: “A Tad Harsh”
item.description: The sequel to the 2003 beloved film currently holds a 94 percent audience score on Rotten Tomatoes.

item.title: Jamie Lee Curtis Responds to Negative ‘Freakier Friday’ Review: “A Tad Harsh”
item.description: The sequel to the 2003 beloved film currently holds a 94 percent audience score on Rotten Tomatoes.

item.title: Box Office: ‘Weapons’ Targets Stellar $40M-Plus Opening, ‘Freakier Friday’ Wows With $30M-Plus
item.description: The two movies are launching ahead of expectations in a double win for the late-summer box office — and the challenged horror and comedy genres.

item.title: Box Office: ‘Weapons’ Targets Stellar $40M-Plus Opening, ‘Freakier Friday’ Wows With $30M-Plus
item.description: The two movies are launching ahead of expectations in a double win for the late-summer box office — and the challenged horror and comedy genres.

item.title: Box Office: ‘Weapons’ Scares Up $5.7M in Previews, ‘Freakier Friday’ Smiles Wide With $3.1M
item.description: The acclaimed horror pic and the female-fueled ‘Freaky Friday’ sequel are expected to end up in a close race for No.1 at the weekend box office.

item.title: Box Office: ‘Weapons’ Scares Up $5.7M in Previews, ‘Freakier Friday’ Smiles Wide With $3.1M
item.description: The acclaimed horror pic and the female-fueled ‘Freaky Friday’ sequel are expected to end up in a close race for No.1 at the weekend box office.

item.title: ‘Freakier Friday’ Review: Jamie Lee Curtis and Lindsay Lohan Struggle to Rekindle the Body-Swap Magic in Shrill “Freakquel”
item.description: Julia Butters, Sophia Hammons and Manny Jacinto also star in Nisha Ganatra’s comedy, which picks up with the characters based on Mary Rodgers’ classic children’s novel two decades later.

item.title: ‘Freakier Friday’ Review: Jamie Lee Curtis and Lindsay Lohan Struggle to Rekindle the Body-Swap Magic in Shrill “Freakquel”
item.description: Julia Butters, Sophia Hammons and Manny Jacinto also star in Nisha Ganatra’s comedy, which picks up with the characters based on Mary Rodgers’ classic children’s novel two decades later.

item.title: Lindsay Lohan Wants to Do “Some More Serious, Dramatic Roles” After ‘Freakier Friday’
item.description: The star reunites with Jamie Lee Curtis for the ‘Freaky Friday’ sequel, then is looking to “really show people a different side of me.”

item.title: Lindsay Lohan Wants to Do “Some More Serious, Dramatic Roles” After ‘Freakier Friday’
item.description: The star reunites with Jamie Lee Curtis for the ‘Freaky Friday’ sequel, then is looking to “really show people a different side of me.”
